entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
